code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // required for the sql component     getContext().getComponent("sql", SqlComponent.class).setDataSource(db).     from("direct:query").to("sql:select * from projects where project in (:#in:names) order by id").to("log:query").to("mock:query"). }
